cards.name: OZ-06MS Leo
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Leo Machine Gun; 1 Armored Feet.
wargear: This model’s Leo Machine Gun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 Bazooka ◦ 1 Colony Beam Pistol ◦ 1 Colony Beam Rifle ◦ 1 Dobergun
This model can be equipped with 1 Parachute Pack.

wargear.name: Parachute Pack
wargear.description: This model gains the [Scouts 9"] ability.

abilities.name: Squad Tactics
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, and there is an OZ BATTLELINE WALKER unit within 6" of this model, reroll a hit roll of 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: OZ-06MS Leo Elite
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Leo Machine Gun; 1 Armored Feet.
wargear: This model’s Leo Machine Gun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 Bazooka ◦ 1 Beam Cannon ◦ 1 Colony Beam Pistol ◦ 1 Colony Beam Rifle ◦ 1 Dobergun
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 Flight Unit ◦ 1 Leo Shield and 1 Beam Saber

wargear.name: Beam Cannon
wargear.description: When targeting a Vehicle or a Monster, attacks from this weapon score Critical Wounds on a 5+.

wargear.name: Flight Unit
wargear.description: This model gains the [Fly] keyword and the [Deep Strike] ability.

wargear.name: Leo Shield
wargear.description: This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against all attacks.

wargear.name: Flight Unit
wargear.description: This model gains the [Fly] keyword and the [Deep Strike] ability.

wargear.name: Leo Shield
wargear.description: This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against all attacks.

abilities.name: Ace
abilities.description: Once per phase, you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll or one saving throw made for this model.

abilities.name: Mass Produced
abilities.description: When this model is within 6" of of a friendly Oz Battleline Walker unit, this model gains the [Lone Operative] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

composition: 1 Lady Une in an OZ-06MS Leo

wargear.name: Flight Unit
wargear.description: This model gains the [Fly] keyword and the [Deep Strike] ability.

wargear.name: Leo Shield
wargear.description: This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against all attacks.

abilities.name: Cold-Blooded
abilities.description: Once per game, when this model is selected as the target of one or more attacks from a single unit, this model may redirect the attack(s) to a friendly Oz Battleline Walker unit within 6".  Note that the new target unit must be within range and a valid target of the original attack(s).

abilities.name: Mass Produced
abilities.description: When this model is within 6" of of a friendly Oz Battleline Walker unit, this model gains the [Lone Operative] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: OZ-07AMS Aries
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Machine Gun; 1 Armored Feet.
wargear: This model’s Machine Gun can be replaced with 1 Missile Launcher.

abilities.name: High Speed Transformation
abilities.description: At the beginning of the game and each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to enter a High Speed Form.  Until the beginning of your next Command phase, this unit gains the [Aircraft] keyword, it's Objective Controlled characteristic becomes 0, and it's Movement characteristic becomes 20+.

cards.name: OZ-07AMS Aries Veteran
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Machine Gun; 1 Armored Feet.
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 additional Machine Gun.
Any of this model’s Machine Guns can each be replaced with 1 Missile Launcher.

abilities.name: High Speed Transformation
abilities.description: At the beginning of the game and each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to enter a High Speed Form.  Until the beginning of your next Command phase, this unit gains the [Aircraft] keyword, it's Objective Controlled characteristic becomes 0, and it's Movement characteristic becomes 20+.

cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Machine Gun; 1 Armored Feet.
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 additional Machine Gun.
Any of this model’s Machine Guns can each be replaced with 1 Missile Launcher.

abilities.name: Ace Tactics
abilities.description: When this model is within 6" of one or more friendly Oz Battleline Walker units, each time this model and those units are selected to make a ranged attack, once per attack you may reroll a hit roll of 1.

abilities.name: Team Leader
abilities.description: When this model is within 6" of one or more friendly Oz Battleline Walker units, this model gains the [Lone Operative] ability.

abilities.name: High Speed Transformation
abilities.description: At the beginning of the game and each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to enter a High Speed Form. composition: 1 Lucrezia Noin in an OZ-07AMS Aries

abilities.name: Committed Idealist (Aura)
abilities.description: When this model is within 6" of one or more friendly Oz Battleline Walker units, this model and those units all may reroll any save roll of 1.

abilities.description: When this model is within 6" of one or more friendly Oz Battleline Walker units, this model gains the [Lone Operative] ability.

abilities.description: At the beginning of the game and each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to enter a High Speed Form.  Until the beginning of your next Command phase, this unit gains the [Aircraft] keyword, it's Objective Controlled characteristic becomes 0, and it's Movement characteristic becomes 20+.

cards.name: OZ-07MS Tragos
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 120mm Low Recoil Cannons; 1 Beam Rifle; 1 Crushing Treads.
wargear: This model may be equipped with 1 Hover Base.

wargear.name: Hover Base
wargear.description: This model's Movement characteristic becomes 14" and it's Objective Controlled characteristic becomes 2.

other.name: Fire Support
other.description: Each time this model Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, ranged weapons equipped this model have the [Ignores Cover] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: OZ-12SMS Taurus
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Beam Rifle; 1 Armored Feet.
wargear: This model’s Beam Rifle can be replaced with 1 Laser Gun.

wargear.name: Beam Rifle
wargear.description: When targeting a Vehicle or a Monster, attacks from these weapons score Critical Wounds on a 5+.

wargear.name: Laser Gun
wargear.description: When targeting a Vehicle or a Monster, enemy models may not use any invulnerable saves.

abilities.name: High Speed Transformation
abilities.description: At the beginning of the game and each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to enter a High Speed Form.  Until the beginning of your next Command phase, this unit gains the [Aircraft] keyword, it's Objective Controlled characteristic becomes 0, and it's Movement characteristic becomes 20+.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
